item.title: ‘If I Had Legs I’d Kick You’ Trailer: Rose Byrne Plays a Spiraling Mother in A24 Dramedy
item.description: A24 has released the trailer for its Sundance Film Festival darling “If I Had Legs I’d Kick You.” The Rose Byrne-led dramedy from writer-director Mary Bronstein is set to hit theater

item.title: Seth Rogen and Rose Byrne Hope to Complete the ‘Neighbors’ Reunion and Bring Zac Efron On ‘Platonic’
item.description: The duo, who played a married couple opposite Efron in the 2014 comedy and its 2016 sequel, return for the second season of ‘Platonic.’

item.title: Seth Rogen and Rose Byrne Hope to Complete the ‘Neighbors’ Reunion and Bring Zac Efron On ‘Platonic’
item.description: The duo, who played a married couple opposite Efron in the 2014 comedy and its 2016 sequel, return for the second season of ‘Platonic.’

item.title: How the ‘Platonic’ Creators Blew Up Their Plans for an Anthology Series
item.description: Halfway through filming the first season, Nicholas Stoller and Francesca Delbanco realized the chemistry between Seth Rogen and Rose Byrne was too good to give up.

item.title: How the ‘Platonic’ Creators Blew Up Their Plans for an Anthology Series
item.description: Halfway through filming the first season, Nicholas Stoller and Francesca Delbanco realized the chemistry between Seth Rogen and Rose Byrne was too good to give up.

item.title: Seth Rogen and Rose Byrne Will Make You Laugh Out Loud in ‘Platonic’ Season 2 Trailer
item.description: The friends (just friends) are back after too long of a wait.
